import React, { useState } from "react" const Main = () => { const [balance, setBalance] = useState(100) const bet = 1; const [number, setNumber] = useState(0) const [numberSecond, setNumberSecond] = useState(0) const [numberThird, setNumberThird] = useState(0) const spin = () => { setInterval(() => { setNumber(Math.floor((Math.random() * 7)) + 3) setNumberSecond(Math.floor((Math.random() * 7)) + 3) setNumberThird(Math.floor((Math.random() * 7)) + 3) },1000) setBalance(balance - bet) } return (

{number}

{numberSecond}

{numberThird}

Win Condition

333

444

555

666

777

888

999

balance: {balance}$

bet: {bet}$

) } export default Main
